name: War of Glory
description:
Come and join War of Glory, you will have chance to unite 13 countries in Europe. It's a MMO SLG war game with sandplay. The Europe map includes 2.5 million fields. You can occupy any of them if your army strong enough!

Features:

1.It's a totally free game, free for download and play game freely. You can develope army and expand territory in your own way.

2.Thousands of players are online and combat each other to plunder resources, expand cities, who will be the leader?

3.Join alliance, wage war together with ally members to conquer war, win glory and lands.

4.Recruit generals, train them, upgrade skills, take them to battle with strategy, they will win you a city!

***Attack and occupy Brussels, you will be the strongest one in sandplay, you will change history!
